attributes.legal-text: Purchased content or services are not refundable or transferable, and cannot be redeemed for cash or credit.
attributes.long-description:
Mind Zero is an action-packed dungeon-crawler RPG for the PlayStation®Vita system. Play as Kei, a high school student whose life turns upside down when he forms a contract with a “MIND,” a weapon/being with deadly powers. With the government and other forces trailing him and his friends, Kei will need to discover the secret behind “MIND.” Will these newfound powers help him or ultimately be his doom?

This content is only compatible with PlayStation®Vita.

Content file size: 1450MB

Copyright：
©2013-2014 ACQUIRE Corp. All Rights Reserved. Licensed to and published by Aksys Games.

One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.
